article_title: New Bloomfield Schools to start using Kelly Educational Staffing

og.description: The New Bloomfield R-III School Board of Education voted for the district to enter into an agreement with Kelly Educational Staffing, a substitute teacher service. Kelly will provide the district with subs and take care of the human resources work associated with the subs.
og.title: New Bloomfield Schools to start using Kelly Educational Staffing
